    ? ??
    AccessDAO
    AccessDAO is for all queries related to authorization.
    AdverseEventDAO
    Used for the logging mechanism.
    AllergyDAO
    DAO stands for Database Access Object.
    ApptDAO  
    ApptTypeDAO  
    AuthDAO
    AuthDAO is for anything that has to do with authentication.
    CPTCodesDAO
    Used for managing CPT codes.
    DrugInteractionDAO
    Used for managing drug interactions.
    FakeEmailDAO
    DAO stands for Database Access Object.
    FamilyDAO
    Used for queries related to families.
    HealthRecordsDAO
    Used for all health records where a whole history is kept.
    HospitalsDAO
    Used for managing hospitals DAO stands for Database Access Object.
    ICDCodesDAO
    Used for managing all ICD codes.
    LabProcedureDAO
    A DAO for managing lab procedure codes.
    LOINCDAO
    DAO stands for Database Access Object.
    MessageDAO
    Used for the logging mechanism.
    NDCodesDAO
    Used for managing the ND Codes.
    OfficeVisitDAO
    Used for doing tasks related to office visits.
    PatientDAO
    Used for managing all static information related to a patient.
    PersonnelDAO
    Used for managing information related to personnel: HCPs, UAPs, Admins DAO stands for Database Access Object.
    ProfilePhotoDAO  
    ReasonCodesDAO
    Used for managing the Reason Codes.
    ReferralDAO
    Used to update referrals, and fetch lists of referrals sent to and from HCPs.
    RemoteMonitoringDAO
    Used for the keeping track of remote monitoring data.
    ReportRequestDAO
    Used for handling data related to report requests.
    RiskDAO
    Used for finding risk factors for a given patient.
    SurveyDAO
    A DAO for handling all Survey data.
    SurveyResultDAO
    A DAO for handling all Survey results.
    TransactionDAO
    Used for the logging mechanism.
    VisitRemindersDAO
    Used for queries related to patient reminders DAO stands for Database Access Object.
